                                            }
                                            else if (num == 10) {
                                                SetQuestionNo(num - 1);
                                                setShowPopover(false)
                                                setTarget(null)
                                            }

                                            else if ((num == 30) && (selectedQuestionariesArray == "Covid-19 Questionnaire")) {
                                                if (answerArray[28].answer.name.includes('The business currently does not have or has never purchased any insurance') || answerArray[28].answer.name.includes('The business does not have access to any insurance') || answerArray[28].answer.name.includes('Actualmente, la empresa no tiene o nunca ha adquirido un seguro.') || answerArray[28].answer.name.includes('La empresa no tiene acceso a ningún seguro.')) {
                                                    SetQuestionNo(num - 2);
                                                } else {
                                                    SetQuestionNo(num - 1);
                                                }
                                            }
                                            else if (num == 39 && (selectedQuestionariesArray != "Covid-19 Questionnaire")) {
                                                debugger
                                                let EarthquakeInArr = typeof (answerArray[12].answer) == 'string' ? [] : answerArray[12].answer.filter(item => item.name == "Earthquake");
                                                let FloodsInArr = typeof (answerArray[12].answer) == 'string' ? [] : answerArray[12].answer.filter(item => item.name == "Floods");
                                                if (EarthquakeInArr.length) {
                                                    SetQuestionNo(num - 1);
                                                }
                                                else if (FloodsInArr.length) {
                                                    SetQuestionNo(num - 2);
                                                }
                                                else {
                                                    SetQuestionNo(num - 3);
                                                }
                                            }
                                            else if (num == 38 && (selectedQuestionariesArray != "Covid-19 Questionnaire")) {
                                                debugger
                                                let FloodsInArr = typeof (answerArray[12].answer) == 'string' ? [] : answerArray[12].answer.filter(item => item.name == "Floods");
                                                if (FloodsInArr.length) {
                                                    SetQuestionNo(num - 1);
                                                }
                                                else {
                                                    SetQuestionNo(num - 2);
                                                }
                                            }
                                            else {
                                                SetQuestionNo(num - 1);
                                            }
                                            SetError(false)
                                        }} >{localStorage.getItem(`LangDataFor${language}`) ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(`LangDataFor${language}`)).prev : ''}</button>
                                    </div>
                                    <div className=' mobileButton' >
                                        {
                                            questionNo == ((selectedQuestionariesArray == "Covid-19 Questionnaire") ? (allQuestionArray[language].length - 1) : (allHazardsQuestionArray[language].length - 1)) ?
                                                <button className='btn ' style={{ backgroundColor: '#b91c26' }} type="submit">
                                                    {localStorage.getItem(`LangDataFor${language}`) ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(`LangDataFor${language}`)).submit : ''}
                                                </button>
                                                :
                                                <button className='btn ' style={{ backgroundColor: '#b91c26' }} disabled={questionNo == ((selectedQuestionariesArray == "Covid-19 Questionnaire") ? (allQuestionArray[language].length - 1) : (allHazardsQuestionArray[language].length - 1))} onClick={nextClick} >
                                                    {localStorage.getItem(`LangDataFor${language}`) ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(`LangDataFor${language}`)).next : ''}
                                                </button>
                                        }
                                        <button className='btn ' style={{ backgroundColor: '#b91c26' }} disabled={questionNo == 0} onClick={() => {
                                            let num = questionNo;
                                            if (num == 12) {//&& (selectedQuestionariesArray == "Covid-19 Questionnaire")
                                                if (answerArray[10].answer.name.includes('Yes') || (language == 'sp' && answerArray[10].answer.name.includes('si'))) {
                                                    SetQuestionNo(num - 1);
                                                } else {
                                                    SetQuestionNo(num - 2);
                                                }
                                            }
                                            if (num == 10) {
                                                SetQuestionNo(num - 1);
                                                setShowPopover(false)
                                                setTarget(null)
                                            }
                                            else if (num == 30 && (selectedQuestionariesArray == "Covid-19 Questionnaire")) {
                                                if (answerArray[28].answer.name.includes('The business currently does not have or has never purchased any insurance') || answerArray[28].answer.name.includes('The business does not have access to any insurance') || answerArray[28].answer.name.includes('Actualmente, la empresa no tiene o nunca ha adquirido un seguro.') || answerArray[28].answer.name.includes('La empresa no tiene acceso a ningún seguro.')) {
                                                    SetQuestionNo(num - 2);
                                                } else {
                                                    SetQuestionNo(num - 1);
                                                }
                                            }
                                            else if (num == 39 && (selectedQuestionariesArray != "Covid-19 Questionnaire")) {
                                                debugger
                                                let EarthquakeInArr = typeof (answerArray[12].answer) == 'string' ? [] : answerArray[12].answer.filter(item => item.name == "Earthquake");
                                                let FloodsInArr = typeof (answerArray[12].answer) == 'string' ? [] : answerArray[12].answer.filter(item => item.name == "Floods");
                                                if (FloodsInArr.length) {
                                                    SetQuestionNo(num - 1);
                                                }
                                                else if (EarthquakeInArr.length) {
                                                    SetQuestionNo(num - 2);
                                                }
                                                else {
                                                    SetQuestionNo(num - 3);
                                                }
                                            }
                                            else if (num == 38 && (selectedQuestionariesArray != "Covid-19 Questionnaire")) {
                                                debugger
                                                let EarthquakeInArr = typeof (answerArray[12].answer) == 'string' ? [] : answerArray[12].answer.filter(item => item.name == "Earthquake");
                                                let FloodsInArr = typeof (answerArray[12].answer) == 'string' ? [] : answerArray[12].answer.filter(item => item.name == "Floods");
                                                if (EarthquakeInArr.length) {
                                                    SetQuestionNo(num - 1);
                                                }
                                                else {
                                                    SetQuestionNo(num - 2);
                                                }
                                            }
                                            else {
                                                SetQuestionNo(num - 1);
                                            }
                                            SetError(false)
                                        }}>
                                            {localStorage.getItem(`LangDataFor${language}`) ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(`LangDataFor${language}`)).prev : ''}
                                        </button>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </form>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </section>
        </IdleTimer>

    );
}

export default geolocated({
    positionOptions: {
        enableHighAccuracy: false,

    userDecisionTimeout: 5000,
})(Questionnaire);
